name: Spell Shield
desc: Increases Anti-Mage's resistance to magic damage.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

name: Ignite
desc: Drenches a target in volatile chemicals, causing it to burst into flames. The target is in immense pain, taking damage and moving more slowly.

name: Bristleback
desc: Bristleback takes less damage if hit on the sides or rear.  If Bristleback takes 210 damage from the rear, he releases a Quill Spray of the current level.

name: Kraken Shell
desc:
Thickens Tidehunter's hide to passively block a portion of any incoming physical attack damage. The hide also removes negative status effects if the damage taken crosses a threshold.

Does not stack with items that provide Damage Block.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel

name: Blade Dance
desc: Gives Juggernaut a chance to deal critical damage on each attack.

name: Battery Assault
desc: Discharges high-powered shrapnel at random nearby enemy units, dealing minor magical damage and ministun.

name: Warpath
desc: Bristleback works himself up into a fury every time he casts a spell, increasing his movement speed and damage.

name: Searing Chains
desc: Ember Spirit unleashes fiery bolas that wrap around nearby enemies, anchoring them in place and dealing damage each second.

name: Scorched Earth
desc: Carpets the nearby earth in flames which damage enemies and heal Doom, while also granting him increased movement speed.

name: Anchor Smash
desc: Tidehunter swings his mighty anchor to damage nearby enemies and reduce their attack damage.
